DOC.brief_title: Supplementation With Human Chorionic Gonadotropin ( hCG ) During Controlled Ovarian Stimulation With Recombinant Follicle-stimulating Hormone ( FSH ) In Vitro Fertilisation
DOC.criteria: 1 . Females indication COS IVF ; 2 . Age 2537 year ; 3 . BMI > 18 < 30 kg/m2 ; 4 . A regular menstrual cycle 24 35 day presumed ovulatory ; 5 . Two ovary ; 6 . Tubal unexplained infertility , include endometriosis stage I/II ; 7 . A uterus consistent expect normal function ( e.g . clinically interfere uterine fibroid ) document transvaginal ultrasound screen ; 8 . Male partner sperm quality compatible fertilization via IVF procedure previous clinical pregnancy ; 9 . Early follicular phase serum FSH level 112 IU/l ; 10 . Early follicular phase total antral follicle ( 210mm ) count ≥ 6 ; 11 . Confirmation downregulation randomisation transvaginal ultrasound ; 12 . Willing able sign inform consent . 1 . History current PCOS , endometriosis stage III/IV severe male factor require ICSI ; 2 . History severe ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) ; 3 . Presence unilateral bilateral hydrosalpinx ultrasound ; 4 . More three previously COS cycle ; 5 . Previous poor response IVFcycle , define > 20 day gonadotrophin stimulation , cancellation due limit follicular response less four follicle ³15 mm diameter ; 6 . Previous IVF cycle unsuccessful fertilization , define fertilisation £20 % retrieved oocytes ; 7 . History recurrent miscarriage ; 8 . FSH > 12IU/L LH > 12UI/L ( early follicular phase ) ; 9 . Contraindications use gonadotropin GnRH analogue ; 10 . Recent history current epilepsy , HIV infection , diabetes cardiovascular gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal pulmonary disease ; 11 . Pregnancy , lactation contraindication pregnancy ; 12 . Current past ( last 12 month ) abuse alcohol drug ; 13 . History chemotherapy ( except gestational condition ) radiotherapy ; 14 . Undiagnosed vaginal bleeding ; 15 . Tumours ovary , breast , adrenal gland , pituitary hypothalamus malformation sexual organ incompatible pregnancy ; 16 . Abnormal karyotyping patient ( karyotyping perform ) ; 17 . Hypersensitivity trial product .
